physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Brachydactyly (short first and fourth metatarsals and short fourth and fifth metacarpals), multiple subcutaneous ossifications, Horner syndrome, history of asthma
Significant for subcutaneous ossifications but no brachydactyly; some speech delay
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight increased to Z=2.8 SDS, height at 50-60% tile

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Calcium: 8.8 mg/dL, PTH: 218 pg/mL, Phosphorus: 7.6 mg/dL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Normal serum levels of calcium, phosphorus, and intact PTH until age 2.5 years
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: PTH levels increased to 218 pg/mL with a corresponding decrease in calcium levels
